column4: hey guys, question. is there a way to install just a couple "unstable" packages, without switching to hoary?
is there good docs on backports? i haven't even heard of those.... or farruinn just answered some questions
Read farruinn reply a few lines up.
thanks. I am actually about to reinstall ubuntu because hoary made my system a bit broken. this is a relatively new install, so I don
but it si good to know about the backports
:: shrugs:: I would just as soon reinstall, needed or not. I can be sure it is clean, and get familiar with the installer and such again.
